name: RS-X
longDescription: Puma RS-X combines retro gaming aesthetics with modern comfort. Features a chunky rubber sole, mesh and synthetic upper, and bold color blocking inspired by 80s arcade culture.

name: Future Rider
longDescription: Puma Future Rider features Rider Foam midsole for cushioning, rubber outsole with gum details, and breathable mesh upper with retro design elements.

name: Suede Classic XXI
longDescription: Puma Suede Classic XXI features premium suede upper, padded collar, and rubber outsole. Originally worn by basketball legend Walt Frazier in the 1970s.

name: Cali Dream
longDescription: Puma Cali Dream combines soft leather and suede upper with platform midsole. Embossed Puma logo and pastel color palette for feminine street style.

name: Thunder Electric
longDescription: Puma Thunder Electric features layered sole unit, mesh and leather upper, and bold color contrasts. Inspired by 90s technical running shoes.

name: Cell Venom
longDescription: Puma Cell Venom combines original Trinomic cushioning with modern updates. Features hexagonal outsole pattern and premium leather/suede upper.

name: Ralph Sampson Low
longDescription: Puma Ralph Sampson Low honors the NBA legend with premium leather upper, cushioned midsole, and vintage basketball outsole pattern.

name: Mirage Sport
longDescription: Puma Mirage Sport features breathable mesh upper, EVA midsole for cushioning, and rubber traction pods for gym workouts and cross-training.

name: Liberate Nitro
longDescription: Puma Liberate Nitro features Nitro Foam midsole for lightweight cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and PumaGrip rubber outsole for traction.

name: Basket Classic
longDescription: Puma Basket Classic combines simple leather upper with iconic Formstrip logo. Versatile low-top design perfect for casual everyday wear.
